Subject: Invitation to Join TechEd Talk – Episode on AI in Education

Hi Dr. Lee,

I’m Maya, host of the *TechEd Talk* podcast where we explore how technology is reshaping learning. Our listeners are passionate about AI‑driven education tools – the most‑played topics on our show this year have been “Artificial Intelligence,” “EdTech,” and “Online Learning.”

Given your groundbreaking work on AI tutoring systems for K‑12 and higher education, I believe you’d be an amazing guest for our upcoming episode titled **“Artificial Intelligence in Education: From K‑12 Tutors to University Classrooms.”** We’d love to discuss how intelligent tutoring can personalize learning pathways, the challenges of scaling these solutions, and your vision for the next generation of AI‑enhanced classrooms.

The episode runs ~45 minutes and is recorded remotely at a time that works for you. We’ll also promote the episode across our social channels and include links to your recent publications (e.g., your recent paper on adaptive tutoring algorithms).

Would you be interested in joining us? Please let me know your availability, and I’ll gladly coordinate a suitable slot.

Thank you for considering the invitation – I’m excited about the possibility of sharing your insights with our audience!

Best regards,
Maya
Host, TechEd Talk
maya@techedtalk.com
